meanings.definition: Run quickly with small, quick steps
meanings.sent1: The little puppy scampers around the yard.
meanings.sent2: She scampers to catch the school bus before it leaves.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel scampers up the tree to hide its acorn.
meanings.sent4: The wind scampers through the leaves, creating a rustling sound.
meanings.sent5: The excited child scampers towards the playground, eager to play.

meanings.definition: A playful or mischievous person or animal
meanings.sent1: The young scampers giggled as they played tag in the park.
meanings.sent2: The little scampers in the family always find a way to have fun.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scampers stole the cookies from the jar.
meanings.sent4: The scampers of a raccoon can be seen in the overturned trash can.
meanings.sent5: The playful scampers chased each other around the garden.
